name: Seated Dumbbell Overhead Press
setup: Sit on bench with back support, feet flat on floor
Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms forward
Engage core, ribs down, neutral spine
steps: Press dumbbells overhead in a slight arc
Fully extend arms without locking elbows
Dumbbells should end slightly in front of head
Lower with control to shoulder height
cues: Press slightly forward, not straight up
Breathe: exhale on press, inhale on descent
mistakes: Pressing straight up instead of slight arc
safety: Use back support if available. Stop if you feel shoulder impingement or pain. Avoid excessive back arch.

regressions: Use neutral grip (palms facing each other)

prescriptionHints.notes: Seated version provides stability for shoulders. Keep core engaged to protect lower back.

joints.notes: Maintain neutral spine and engaged core throughout. Reduce weight if shoulders feel pinched.
